reviewText: I like Alonzo and think he is witty and funny; however, this DVD just didn't bring out the funny material I'm used to hearing.  I laughed at his clips on youtube...I didn't laugh once while watching this DVD.  Save your money and just watch his clips on youtube.
Alonzo is one of my favorite comedians.  I saw him in concert and he was awesome!  This DVD captures his essence!

"Tall, Dark, and Funny" is a must-have for anyone who appreciates humor with an edge.  Alonzo Bodden is an eloquent and insightful comic who delivers his stand-up act in a dry but good-natured manner.  He is proof positive of the fact that funny equals sexy.
Enjoyed the show. It's hard to make my husband and I laugh out loud and Alonzo was able to several times.  Definitely a keeper!

This guy is the funniest comic I've seen in a loooooooong time - and the fact that he's drop-dead gorgeous doesn't hurt, either.

His brain picks up stuff and throws it back out in such a funny way, I bought extra DVDs and sent them to all my friends.

I recommend this DVD to anyone with a funnybone.
This guy has very original material in his stand up comedy. You will laugh non stop for an hour.

I recently saw Alonzo Bodden on The Tonight Show, and thought he was really funny, so looked him up on Amazon.com and ordered this dvd, which was mentioned on the Tonight Show as just having been released.  I highly recommend this DVD, "Tall, Dark and Funny" to Everyone, no matter what your ethnic background. He is not overly fouled mouthed, which personally, I like. I don't think anyone will be disappointed with "Tall, Dark & Funny," which Alonzo Bodden definitely is!
What happened? He's so much funnier than this.
I love his take on very real subjects.

I did not enjoy this dvd with Alonzo Bodden as much as I loved his other Album called "No one is listening"-something like that. He is a very very funny man. My wife and I love listening to him on the radio and enjoyed the dvd I listed.
Alonzo Bodden is an unbelievable unknown talent. He is like a black George Carlen. I have both of his albums and they are hysterical.
My husband is a big fan of Alonzo Bodden so I got this DVD for him and we both enjoyed it.
Alonzo Bodden is a funny, funny man! This is a great DVD that showcases some of his best bitts on stage.
This DVD had previews of comedians I didn't think was so funny but when the actual show started I was laughing and impressed for good funny comedy
Disappointed that it wasn't drop dead funny. Had some bad language unsuitable for children. Had some funny moments. Entertaining but wish Had newer than 2005 version.
